name: STORMS (itch)
description:
Set to one long noise \ drone track.

Three bad endings.

GUIDELINES

Best played in Fullscreen with headphones in a darkened room.

Tabbing out of the game will cause the music to go out of sync – so please don't do that.

If you become stuck consult 'Tips If Your Stuck'.

CONTROLS

– Arrow keys to move

– Enter to skip through text

– Esc to exit game

– F5 for Windowed Mode

– F6 for Fullscreen
